dict.string: We Computer Science Ph.Ds and Chinese Study Maters graduated from NUS have been working very hard to design and develop Ez-Learn App for teachers and children. Ez-Learn Features: · Children Learning Becomes Playing IPad Games · Teacher Designing Game by Mouse Click · Individualized and Interactive Education from Cloud Contact Us E-mail: info@kudospark.com www.kudospark.com Copy Right 2014@KudoSpark Pte.
